attributes.action: Stop the abuse of our civil rights!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop threatning TV & intimidating radio adverts regarding Crushing your car if you don`t have tax, fine you if your a day late paying your tax bill, treaten the uk population about paying there TV licence, abolish CCTV cameras, Speed cameras and start using there powers to catch real criminals i.e Sex Offenders, muderers,organised crime the justice system is laughable when you can get a longer prison sentence for not paying for your council tax bill than you would for murder, all this govertment can do at the moment is use the press to treaten the population of the uk and CCTV cameras to watch us all 24/7!!
